AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Gakuen Average Student
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Gakuen average student. She does not need a description at all.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Gakuen Music Club
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of a Gakuen music club. She dreams of being a lead singer.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Gakuen Baseball Player
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a Gakuen baseball player. Her team has won the national campaign for five consecutive years.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Gakuen Garden Club
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of a Gakuen garden club. Her favourite are Stargazers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Cat Cafe
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an employee of a cat cafe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Gakuen Sculpture Club
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Gakuen sculpture club. Her best work is Sweat No.2VOPN. This piece bears an illustration of a missile. If you squint your eyes, the unbalanced composition of the image reveals the outline of a gourd.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Cooking Club
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Gakuen cooking club. The club gets really busy before Valentine day.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Gakuen Karate Club
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Gakuen karate club. She likes to have some juice after practice.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Outing Club
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a member of Gakuen outing club. She should have bypassed the camp of the cannibal tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Annelitrice Gakuen Student Association
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as a representative of a Gakuen student association. Her duty is to enforce the discipline of the Gakuen.
